QuestData.Title: Subversive Infestation
QuestData.Description: As lord of the Everbloom my charge was the weaponization of nature.$B$BYou have likely seen the fruits of my labor in your journeys across my world.$B$BMy discoveries have allowed my kind to control the invasive species of Draenor through subversive infestation. I speak of total systemic control of the invading organism - the mind and the body.$B$BNow that you are my master I offer these gifts to you, but first you must retrieve my research and tools from the Everbloom.$B$BDo this and great power is yours.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover Phylarch's Research, Xeri'tac's Venom Gland, and 3 Depleted Everbloom Seeds from the Everbloom and return to Phylarch the Evergreen.
